Bless/Buff: Regeneration 10%
 
(Affects Demons and Undead [demonundead], Armor Negating [armornegating], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic Resistance Negates Easily [mrnegateseasily], No effect on Demons [demonimmune])
An unholy prayer that makes the animating vines of most Manikins on the battlefield regrow at incredible speed. Damage sustained by a regrowing Manikin will quickly heal. Magically powerful Mandragoras are not always affected by this spell.
